overview:
Based in Hong Kong, Derek Banker has contributed through various senior leadership roles. He spent seven years with Williams Lea Asia Limited, where he served as Chief Operating Officer and Chief Executive Officer of the business process outsourcing (BPO) provider. Throughout his tenure, Derek increased the firm’s business by more than 50 percent annually. He oversaw sales, marketing, and operations, and developed strategy for the organization.

As COO, Derek conducted research and provided analysis and insight regarding business trends related to translations, document solutions, and print management activities. He also established new offices in New Zealand and China and launched a regional print management platform.

Previously, Derek devoted six years as a Director for Bowne Williams Lea Asia Limited. He relocated to the Far East to assume the role and began establishing the firm’s operations in the region. He oversaw the opening of offices in Japan, Singapore, Taiwan, mainland China, Hong Kong, and South Korea. He also launched an Australian site and led merger and acquisition activities on the continent. He held responsibility for developing his company’s regional presence, including developing business and assessing opportunities in local markets.

Derek also lived in London and New York, where he worked for other outsourcing providers in leadership roles.

Outside of his career, Derek Banker volunteers with the International Coastal Cleanup in Hong Kong. He also holds memberships in The British Chamber of Commerce in Hong Kong and the American Chamber of Commerce in Hong Kong.

Milestones

  • Established ground-up, turnkey operations in Hong Kong, Singapore, Japan, South Korea, China, Taiwan, Australia and New Zealand
  • Grew an Asia Pacific business from zero to $100M
  • Directed project implementation in 100 pan-Asia locations

United States born citizen with Hong Kong permanent residence status.
